Atem: A legendary pharaoh and character from the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise, known for his connection to ancient Egypt and card dueling.
Bakura: A recurring antagonist from the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise, often associated with dark magic and ancient artifacts.
Yu-Gi-Oh!: A popular Japanese manga and anime franchise primarily focused on a trading card game, featuring magical battles and ancient lore.
